room_title: Escape room "The Mafia Heist" by Escape This Live: Columbus in Columbus (GA)
room_description:
It's smack in the middle of the Prohibition, and the Boss, Papa Mancini, has been tipped off that the Gorreti Brothers have stolen his Tarantula Juice deal with Gin's Pharmacy. Everyone knows you don't rip off Papa Mancini!
You and the crew must sneak into the Gorreti Brother's poker lair while they are out on the town. You will have to work together to find the cash that rightfully belongs to Papa Mancini, and get out before you all get whacked! You only have 60 minutes, and you've been warned this poker lair might be tricky! Do you have what it takes to complete this Mafia Heist and escape the Gorreti poker lair?
